description: This blood-colored&nbsp;tequila and&nbsp;beet cocktail is the Moradita, which means "little death" in Spanish. It's a fresh drink with some real body that has just enough elegance to balance it out—perfect for when you want something&nbsp;healthy tasting but still have your senses whetted by spice!
name: Moradita
recipeIngredient: 1⁄2 oz. Jalapeño-infused tequila (such as Dulce Vida)

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
